getConfigItem: MATCH (spt:script_template{guid:{guid}})-[r:has]->(ci:config_item) RETURN ci, LABELS(ci)[0] AS lbl
getEventType: MATCH (spt:script_template{guid:{guid}})-[r:generates]->(et:event_type) RETURN et, LABELS(et)[0] AS lbl
getTriggerDataItem: MATCH (spt:script_template{guid:{guid}})-[r:trigger]->(di:data_item) RETURN di, LABELS(di)[0] AS lbl
getScriptTemplateInfoByAduGuid: MATCH (:admin_unit{guid:{guid}})<-[:has]-(spt:script_template) WHERE LOWER(spt.scope) <> 'public' AND LOWER(spt.type) <> 'action' RETURN spt,LABELS(spt)[0] AS lbl
getScriptTemplateInfoByContractType: MATCH (:contract_type{guid:{guid}})-[:has]->(:term_service)-[:has]->(spt:script_template) WHERE LOWER(spt.type) <> 'action' RETURN spt,LABELS(spt)[0] AS lbl
createLink: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}}),(d:DEST_LBL {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:REL]->(d) RETURN r as rid
